data.title: David Dhawan
data.meta_description: David Dhawan is an Indian movie director. He is a well known film maker of the country. He mostly directs comedy movies.
data.text:
David Dhawan is an Indian film director of great reputation during the 1990s. The actual name of David Dhawan is Rajinder Dhawan. Actor Anil Dhawan is his brother. David Dhawan was the student of the Film and Television Institute of India, Pune.

David Dhawan specializes in directing comedy films. These films are often studded with actors like Govinda, Sanjay Dutt, Anil Kapoor or Salman Khan in lead roles with some having a combination along with his favourite heroines like Raveena Tandon, Karishma Kapoor and Juhi Chawla playing the leading actresses. Other preferable casts of David Dhawan include Kader Khan, Shakti Kapoor and Paresh Rawal to play the supporting roles. His biggest smash hit success till date is the 1993 film Aankhen, featuring Govinda and Chunkey Pandey. David Dhawan started his career as an editor and then took the thrust into direction.

Personal Life of David Dhawan

He married Karuna Dhawan and they have two children Rohit and Varun. Rohit is an aspiring director, while Dhawan's younger son wishes to be an actor.

Filmography of David Dhawan

Year Film

1989 Aandhiyan

1990 Aag Ka Gola, Jurrat

1992 Shola Aur Shabnam, Bol Radha Bol

1993 Aankhen

1994 Raja Babu, Eena Meena Deeka, Andaz

1995 Yaraana, Coolie No. 1

1996 Loafer

1997 Mr and Mrs Khiladi, Banarasi Babu, Judwaa, Deewana Mastana, Saajan Chale Sasural

1998 Bade Miyan Chote Miyan, Hero No. 1

1999 Gharwali Bharwali, Biwi No.1, Haseena Maan Jaayegi

2000 Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge, Kunwara, Chal Mere Bhai

2001 Jodi No.1

2002 Chor Machaaye Shor, Yeh Hai Jalwa, Hum Kisise Kum Nahi

2003 Ek Aur Ek Gyarah

2004 Mujhse Shaadi Karogi

2005 Shaadi No. 1, Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya

2007 Partner

2009 Do Knot Disturb

2010 Hook Ya Crook

2011 Rascals, Sanki
